The inclusive logistics where everyone wins.

Lazr is the most-complete transportation platform out there, bringing added value to all supply chain actors is our mission.

Welcome to inclusive logistics where everyone wins.

Our business model is unique in many ways. First and foremost, in order to be a platform, one has to create value for all parties. In our case this means bringing the much needed tools to the supply chain actors. Welcome to the future of logistics and good news, it is awesome!

Our team is strong of a solid experience in the transportation and logistics sector. We have found that things can be done in a new and better way. Provided with the right tools, the user is empowered. Sure, logistics can be complicated, there are a lot of things to know and you are basically left to yourself in a trial and error process that can be costly. Not with Lazr.

It takes years to become a master in logistics. Using our platform transfroms the user into an expert instantly, you will be able to navigate pricing, booking, documentation and data like a pro in no time while impressing your colleagues with the results.

Our Services

Lazr becomes your logistics team command center


Over the road


Our pricing engine is simply unique. You will get instant pricing from all major carriers. That is a feat itself. Lazr pushes this perk further by offering the offer of thousands of partner-carriers and 3PL's in the mix. This is the most complete offer you can get.

Inter-modal


Our goal is to add value to your supply-chain, this means getting the right option for your moves, every time. In order to accomplish this, we now offer a unique approach to Inter-Modal transportation (rail+trucking). Our engine create service combinations you will not fin elsewhere.

Custom Logistics


Our inclusive approach puts you in contact with logistics specialist who are happy to provide the custom solutions you need. Instead of looking all over the place to find your options, Lazr does it all, you get all levels of service within the same app and dashboards.

Specialized cargo


With the help of our specialist-partners, there is no limit to the size order you can add to your Lazr account. We manags wide-loads, oversized cargo and overweight cargo with the same ease we do all other shipments. Put our experts to the test.

Data management


We are all about making your logistics needs easier. Getting the level of control and oversight on your transportation operations to the next level really feels good. Our command center makes you avoid unnecessary fees and our KPI create profit. Boom!

Documentation & EDI communication

If someone were to say you will never need to fill-out a BOL ever again, you can either call them a liar, or log-in to your Lazr account and live this dream. Also, our platform organizes, places and supplies all documentation for every shipment, never lose a document again.

How it works


Shipping and handling your merchandise can be very hard. Lazr lightens the load. This section is a timeline showcasing how it works and why it's so much better then the old way!

  • Fabricate your awesome product

    The beginning is a great place to start. You and your team craft your beautiful product.

    But oops. Now it needs to be shipped properly.

    You have to figure out the best option, keeping in mind freight costs, expected delivery dates, transit times, customs & documentation, advising all parties and that is only the start! Making a mistake here could result in big problems, better make the right choice.
  • Luckily for you, there is Lazr. Logging into your Lazr account means you are now a logistics hero!

    Every time you need to handle merchandise movements, Lazr comes into play and allows you ship effortlessly as you are being accompanied at every step.

    Log in to your Lazr account

  • Fill in your info (takes seconds!)

    We have engineered our platform to be easy to use! Everything we do is directed towards making your life simpler. The load information sheet is a great example of that.

    Our unique address completion engine helps you find the address you're looking while the form fills itself effortlessly. We have also spent a lot of time tinkering on the load information part, with Lazr you are not left wondering if did the right thing, you will be guided throughout the process.
  • Lazr's algorithm searches throughout all the possible options to offer you a complete scan of the market in seconds. Our algorithm is the most complete as it looks across different service types, 100+ direct connections and 1,000,000,000 price items.

    If the option you'd like is not already offered, our unique way also includes the best logistics providers out there who are ready to fulfil your pricing and shipping needs in one click, from the same dashboard.

    Select and ship!

  • Follow your shipment in your command center

    Track shipments, see what tasks are pending, where you need to put your attention, get priceless KPI's from your very own dashboard + a lot more.

    Did we mention you can do all of that with your team of colleagues, customers and suppliers?

Why Lazr?

From instant freight rates to awesome dashboards and easy to access information, Lazr has a lot to offer your company.

pricing intelligence


Awesome, industry leading algorithm. Our instant pricing engine delivers. Our users have saved an average of 21% on LTL pricings using our engine and discounts.

Team approach


Inviting your colleagues to collaborate on our platform has countless advantages. Communication gets streamlined and efficient goes up every time. Impress your colleague by getting out your mobile and show them where their merchandise is on our freight tracking map.

Data-driven


Getting a hold of your supply-chain means making your business better and more equipped towards its objectives. Using our app means you will learn more about the shipping process and in order be able to make educated decisions on the road to take.

Humongous time saving

Getting instant pricing makes you save a lot of time. Our users have observed hours saved every week using the platform. We also mentionned our platform helps you improve your supply chain processes, this means you will both work less and be better, that's a great thing.
